frontmatter.title: Block Formatting Context
frontmatter.summary: The block formatting context is part of the visual CSS rendering of a web page. It affects the layout by changing how the contained elements float and clear.

frontmatter.title: Flex
frontmatter.summary: The Flexbox Layout module aims at providing a more efficient way to lay out, align and distribute space among items in a container, even when their size is unknown or dynamic.

frontmatter.title: Transmission Control Protocol
frontmatter.summary: The transmission control protocol (TCP) is the internet standard ensuring the successful exchange of data packets between devices over a network.
